languages.text: "Неужели тьма космоса за время изгнания свела тебя с ума, сестра?" {n}Воин отшатывается от Ирлиэт, словно от жара пламени.{/n} "Даже идущие Путем Провидцев со всем их могуществом избегают единения душ с предками в Контуре. Потому что мудры и знают — ритуал губителен для души. Твои же шансы на успех... просто ничтожны. Ты погибнешь, так ничего и не добившись! А если не сгинешь сразу, ответь себе честно — станут ли предки слушать простого Изгоя?"

traits.locale_text: "Неужели тьма космоса за время изгнания свела тебя с ума, сестра?" {n}Воин отшатывается от Ирлиэт, словно от жара пламени.{/n} "Даже идущие Путем Провидцев со всем их могуществом избегают единения душ с предками в Контуре. Потому что мудры и знают — ритуал губителен для души. Твои же шансы на успех... прочто ничтожны. Ты погибнешь, так ничего и не добившись! А если не сгинешь сразу, ответь себе честно — станут ли предки слушать простого Изгоя?"
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

languages.text: "Did the darkness of space drive you mad during your exile, sister?" {n}Shairenkhei recoils from Yrliet as if from a scorching flame.{/n} "Even those who walk the Path of the Seer baulk at joining souls with the ancestors inside the Circuit. They are wise and know that the ritual is perilous to the spirit. Your chances of success are... simply non-existent. You would die without achieving anything! And even if you did not die immediately, ask yourself honestly: why should the ancestors listen to a simple Outcast?"
languages.original_text: "Неужели тьма космоса за время изгнания свела тебя с ума, сестра?" {n}Воин отшатывается от Ирлиэт, словно от жара пламени.{/n} "Даже идущие Путем Провидцев со всем их могуществом избегают единения душ с предками в Контуре. Потому что мудры и знают — ритуал губителен для души. Твои же шансы на успех... просто ничтожны. Ты погибнешь, так ничего и не добившись! А если не сгинешь сразу, ответь себе честно — станут ли предки слушать простого Изгоя?"

traits.locale_text: "Has the darkness of space driven you mad during the exile, sister?" {n}Shairenkhei recoils from Yrliet as if from the scorching flame.{/n} "Not even the ones walking the Path of the Seer with all their power risk joining the souls of the ancestors inside the Circuit. They are wise and know that the ritual is perilous for the soul. Your chances of success are... simply negligible. You will die before you achieve anything! And even if you will not, ask yourself fairly. Why should the ancestors listen to a simple Exile?"
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

traits.locale_text: "Has the darkness of space driven you mad during the exile, sister?" {n}Shairenkhei recoils from Yrliet as if from the scorching flame.{/n} "Not even the ones walking the Path of the Seer with all their power risk joining the souls of the ancestors inside the Circuit. They are wise and know that the ritual is perilous for the soul. Your chances of success are... simply negligible. You will die before you achieve anything! And even if you will not, ask yourself fairly. Why should the ancestors listen to a simple Exile?"
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

They are wise and know that the ritual is perilous for the soul. Your chances of success are... simply negligible. You would die before you achieved anything! And even if you would not, ask yourself fairly. Why should the ancestors listen to a simple Exile?"

And even if you would not, ask yourself fairly. Why should the ancestors listen to a simple Exile?"

They are wise and know that the ritual is perilous to the spirit. Your chances of success are... simply non-existent. You would die without achieving anything! And even if you did not die immediately, ask yourself honestly: why should the ancestors listen to a simple Outcast?"

traits.locale_text: "Did the darkness of space drive you mad during your exile, sister?" {n}Shairenkhei recoils from Yrliet as if from a scorching flame.{/n} "Even those who walk the Path of the Seer baulk at joining souls with the ancestors inside the Circuit. They are wise and know that the ritual is perilous to the spirit. Your chances of success are... simply non-existent. You would die without achieving anything! And even if you did not die immediately, ask yourself honestly: why should the ancestors listen to a simple Outcast?"
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

languages.text: «¿Acaso has perdido la razón en tu exilio en la negrura del espacio, hermana?». {n}Shairenkhei se aparta bruscamente de Yrliet como si fuese una llama viva.{/n} «Incluso aquellos que recorren la Senda del Vidente se opondrían a una unión con las almas de los ancestros que habitan el Circuito. Son sabios y entienden que el ritual es peligroso para su espíritu. Tus posibilidades de éxito son... inexistentes. ¡Morirás antes de conseguir nada! Y aunque no fuera así, dime, con el corazón en la mano, por qué escucharían los ancestros a una mera proscrita».
languages.original_text: "Did the darkness of space drive you mad during your exile, sister?" {n}Shairenkhei recoils from Yrliet as if from a scorching flame.{/n} "Even those who walk the Path of the Seer baulk at joining souls with the ancestors inside the Circuit. They are wise and know that the ritual is perilous to the spirit. Your chances of success are... simply non-existent. You would die without achieving anything! And even if you did not die immediately, ask yourself honestly: why should the ancestors listen to a simple Outcast?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Acaso has perdido la razón en tu exilio en la negrura del espacio, hermana?». {n}Shairenkhei se aparta bruscamente de Yrliet como si fuese una llama viva.{/n} «Ni siquiera aquellos que recorren la Senda del Vidente, con todo su poder, se arriesgarían a esa unión con las almas de los ancestros que habitan el Circuito. Son sabios y entienden que el ritual es peligroso para el alma. Tus posibilidades de éxito son... sencillamente insignificantes. ¡Morirás antes de conseguir nada! Y aunque no fuera así, dime, con el corazón en la mano, por qué escucharían los ancestros a una mera proscrita».
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

languages.text: “莫非你在流浪的过程中，被宇宙的黑暗逼疯了吗，姐妹？”{n}榭伦凯从伊莉耶特身边退开，仿佛在躲避灼热的火焰。{/n}“即便是那些全心全意投身于先知道途的人，也不愿冒险与永恒回路中的先祖之灵沟通。他们很清楚，这种仪式对灵魂极其危险，而你这么做……根本就是十死无生。恐怕你什么都来不及做，就会立刻惨死当场！就算你侥幸没死，你也得好好扪心自问一下，为什么那些先祖要听一个平凡的流浪者的话呢？”
languages.original_text: "Did the darkness of space drive you mad during your exile, sister?" {n}Shairenkhei recoils from Yrliet as if from a scorching flame.{/n} "Even those who walk the Path of the Seer baulk at joining souls with the ancestors inside the Circuit. They are wise and know that the ritual is perilous to the spirit. Your chances of success are... simply non-existent. You would die without achieving anything! And even if you did not die immediately, ask yourself honestly: why should the ancestors listen to a simple Outcast?"

traits.locale_text: “莫非你在流浪的过程中，被宇宙的黑暗逼疯了吗，姐妹？”{n}榭伦凯从伊莉耶特身边退开，仿佛在躲避灼热的火焰。{/n}“即便是那些全心全意投身于先知道途的人，也不会冒险与永恒回路中的先祖灵魂沟通。他们很清楚，这种仪式对灵魂极其危险，而你成功的几率……几乎可以忽略不计。你恐怕什么都没做得到，就会白白丧命！就算你侥幸没死，你也得好好扪心自问一下，为什么那些先祖要听一个平凡的流浪者的话呢？”
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

languages.text: {n}Shairenkhei s'écarte d'Yrliet, comme s'il s'était brûlé.{/n} « Les ténèbres de l'espace vous ont-elles rendue folle au cours de votre exil, ma sœur ? Même ceux qui suivent la Voie du Prophète ne se risquent pas à communiquer avec les âmes des ancêtres dans le Circuit. Ils sont sages et savent que ce rituel est périlleux pour l'esprit. Vos chances de réussite sont... insignifiantes, vous périrez avant d'avoir accompli quoi que ce soit ! Et même si vous parvenez à ne pas mourir immédiatement, pourquoi les ancêtres écouteraient-ils une simple Errante ? »
languages.original_text: "Did the darkness of space drive you mad during your exile, sister?" {n}Shairenkhei recoils from Yrliet as if from a scorching flame.{/n} "Even those who walk the Path of the Seer baulk at joining souls with the ancestors inside the Circuit. They are wise and know that the ritual is perilous to the spirit. Your chances of success are... simply non-existent. You would die without achieving anything! And even if you did not die immediately, ask yourself honestly: why should the ancestors listen to a simple Outcast?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Shairenkhei s'écarte d'Yrliet, comme s'il s'était brûlé.{/n} « Les ténèbres de l'espace vous ont-elles rendue folle au cours de votre exil, ma sœur ? Même ceux qui suivent la Voie du Prophète, avec tous leurs pouvoirs, ne se risquent pas à communiquer avec les âmes des ancêtres dans le Circuit. Ils sont sages et savent que ce rituel est périlleux pour l'âme. Vos chances de réussite sont tout simplement insignifiantes, vous périrez avant d'avoir pu accomplir quoi que ce soit ! Et même si vous parvenez à entrer en contact avec les ancêtres, pourquoi écouteraient-ils une simple Errante ? »
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

languages.text: 「追放の間、宇宙の闇に狂わされたのか？」{n}まるで灼熱の炎から逃れるように、シャイレンケイはユリエットから身を離す。{/n}「祖先の魂と回路内で合流する危険を冒すのは、力を尽くして予見者の道を歩む者でさえなさぬことだ。彼らは賢明で、その儀式が魂にとって危険であることを知っている。成功の可能性は…ほとんどない。何も成し遂げることなく、命を落とすことだろう。たとえ即死でなくても、己に問いかけてもらいたい。一体なぜ、父祖が追放者の言うことに耳を傾けると思うのだ？」
languages.original_text: "Did the darkness of space drive you mad during your exile, sister?" {n}Shairenkhei recoils from Yrliet as if from a scorching flame.{/n} "Even those who walk the Path of the Seer baulk at joining souls with the ancestors inside the Circuit. They are wise and know that the ritual is perilous to the spirit. Your chances of success are... simply non-existent. You would die without achieving anything! And even if you did not die immediately, ask yourself honestly: why should the ancestors listen to a simple Outcast?"

traits.locale_text: 「追放の間、宇宙の闇に狂わされたのか、妹よ？」{n}まるで灼熱の炎から逃れるように、シャイレンケイはユリエットから身を離す。{/n}「祖先の魂と回路内で合流する危険を冒すのは、力を尽くして予見者の道を歩む者でさえなさぬことだ。彼らは賢明で、その儀式が魂にとって危険であることを知っている。成功の可能性は…ごくわずかだ。何かを成し遂げる前に、命を落とすことだろう。そうでなくとも、己に問いかけてもらいたい。なぜ、父祖が追放者の言うことに耳を傾けると思うのだ？」
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

languages.text: "Hat die Dunkelheit des Alls Euch während des Exils in den Wahnsinn getrieben, Schwester?" {n}Shairenkhei weicht vor Yrliet zurück wie vor einer sengenden Flamme.{/n} "Nicht einmal jene, die den Pfad Sehers beschreiten, würden es je riskieren, ihre Seelen mit denen der Ahnen innerhalb der Matrix zu vereinen. Sie sind weise und wissen, dass das Ritual gefährlich für den Verstand ist. Eure Erfolgsaussichten sind ... schlicht nicht vorhanden. Ihr würdet sterben, ohne etwas zu erreichen! Und selbst, wenn Ihr nicht augenblicklich sterbt, fragt Euch einmal ehrlich: Warum sollten die Ahnen auf eine simple Ausgestoßene hören?"
languages.original_text: "Did the darkness of space drive you mad during your exile, sister?" {n}Shairenkhei recoils from Yrliet as if from a scorching flame.{/n} "Even those who walk the Path of the Seer baulk at joining souls with the ancestors inside the Circuit. They are wise and know that the ritual is perilous to the spirit. Your chances of success are... simply non-existent. You would die without achieving anything! And even if you did not die immediately, ask yourself honestly: why should the ancestors listen to a simple Outcast?"

traits.locale_text: "Hat die Dunkelheit des Alls Euch während des Exils in den Wahnsinn getrieben, Schwester?" {n}Shairenkhei weicht vor Yrliet zurück wie vor einer sengenden Flamme.{/n} "Nicht einmal jene, die den Pfad des Sehers beschreiten, die also viel Macht besitzen, würden es je riskieren, die Seelen der Ahnen innerhalb der Matrix zu berühren. Sie sind weise und wissen, dass das Ritual gefährlich für die Seele ist. Eure Erfolgsaussichten sind ... kaum vorhanden. Ihr würdet sterben, ehe Ihr irgendetwas erreicht! Und selbst wenn nicht, fragt Euch einmal ehrlich: Warum sollten die Ahnen auf eine simple Ausgestoßene hören?"
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

languages.text: "Sürgünün esnasında uzayın karanlığı seni aklından mı etti kardeşim?" {n}Shairenkhei, kavurucu bir alevden kaçarcasına Yrliet'ten uzaklaşıyor.{/n} "Medyumun Yolu'nda yürüyenler bile Devre'nin içindeki atalarımızla ruhlarını birleştirmekten kaçındılar. Onlar bilgedir, ayinin ruh için tehlike teşkil ettiğini bilirler. Senin başarı şansın ise... Mevcut değil bile. Daha hiçbir şey elde edemeden ölebilirsin! Bir anda ölmezsen bile kendine şunu dürüstçe sor: Neden atalarımız, sıradan bir Yurtsuz'u dinlesin?"
languages.original_text: "Did the darkness of space drive you mad during your exile, sister?" {n}Shairenkhei recoils from Yrliet as if from a scorching flame.{/n} "Even those who walk the Path of the Seer baulk at joining souls with the ancestors inside the Circuit. They are wise and know that the ritual is perilous to the spirit. Your chances of success are... simply non-existent. You would die without achieving anything! And even if you did not die immediately, ask yourself honestly: why should the ancestors listen to a simple Outcast?"

traits.locale_text: "Sürgünün esnasında uzayın karanlığı seni aklından mı etti kardeşim?" {n}Shairenkhei, kavurucu bir alevden kaçarcasına Yrliet'ten uzaklaşıyor.{/n} "Medyumun Yolundan yürüyenler bile Devrenin içindeki atalarımızla ruhlarını birleştirmekten kaçındılar. Onlar bilgedir ve ayinin ruh için tehlike teşkil ettiğini bilirler. Senin başarı şansın ise... Mevcut bile değil. Daha hiçbir şey elde edemeden ölebilirsin! Bir anda ölmezsen bile kendine şunu dürüstçe sor: Neden atalarımız, sıradan bir Yurtsuz'u dinlesinler?"
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader
